title: CZ Says Binance’s Token Listing Process is ‘Broken’
body: Binance founder and former CEO Changpeng “CZ” Zhao said he thinks Binance’s token listing process is “broken.” In a long post reflecting on the TST memecoin situation, Zhao concluded that “the Binance listing process is a bit broken. They announce, then list 4 hours later. The notice period is necessary, but in those 4 hours, the token prices go high on DEXes, and then people sell on CEX…” Noting that he was speaking as an observer and not for Binance, he added that he is “not sure there is a solution for this though.” To continue reading this as well as other DeFi and Web3 news, visit us at thedefiant.io

title: XRP News Today: Canary Capital Moves Forward With XRP ETF, While New Altcoin Follows In XRP Success
body: The post XRP News Today: Canary Capital Moves Forward With XRP ETF, While New Altcoin Follows In XRP Success appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The Chicago Board Options Exchange submitted four separate applications for XRP exchange-traded funds (ETFs) with the SEC on Jan. 6, 2025. These applications were filed by WisdomTree, 21 Shares, Bitwise, and Canary. Despite a recent 13.33% drop in XRP price over the past week and nearing its previous all-time high of $3.39 on January 4, 2025, the applications have been submitted. However, recently investors are looking for a new meme coin to focus all their attention on, and have turned their eyes to an up and coming token, Yeti Ouro (YETIO) . XRP ETF journey On October 8, 2024, Canary Capital submitted a registration statement to the United States SEC for the proposed Canary XRP ETF. Canary expects its XRP ETF to give investors direct exposure to movements in the price of XRP without the technicalities of owning the digital asset itself, including custody and security related issues. The fund from Canary Capital will be investing in XRP directly while also benchmarking against the price action of XRP against the dollar. This approach is designed to provide a simple investing alternative for people wanting to capitalize on the dynamics surrounding the XRP token without having to directly trade the token on any cryptocurrency exchange. Cointelegraph states the growing interest in XRP ETFs have skyrocketed since XRP’s win in the historic SEC v. Ripple Labs legal battle. XRP has come under strong selling, lowering its price by 11.76% to $2.42 , despite the past week bringing general technical growth including regulatory improvements and increasing institutional interest in XRP ETFs. Still, investors were wary since the current price behavior points to continuous market volatility. XRP’s market capitalization still exceeds $139 billion, though, which reflects long-term investors’ continuous curiosity. Long term, this would also help to change the sentiment and preserve the XRP price. Yeti Ouro: Revolutionizing DeFi And GameFi Yeti Ouro (YETIO) is a cryptocurrency project focused on bridging the world between DeFi and GameFi. The Yeti Ouro Ecosystem is a Play-to-Earn (P2E) racing game — Yeti Go, that enables players to earn its YETIO tokens while competing in higher-than-max immersive environments. Yeti Go is the new addition to the Yeti Ouro ecosystem that seeks to seamlessly combine gaming and earning in a single play-to-earn racing game. Yeti Go is still under development being built on Unreal Engine 5, but there has been a significant buzz among early adopters regarding its gameplay mechanics and reward system. The developers are working on a regular cadence, which, combined with a clear roadmap, means that Yeti Go is surely moving towards its launch and in the process, shifting the paradigm of crypto gaming for good. The developers have teamed up with the visionary talents behind Call of Duty, Spiderman, Dead Space, and The Witcher to create breathtaking character assets, while Grammy-nominated industry experts craft the audio, drawing from their work with Major Lazer, Vybz Kartel, and Kabaka Pyramid. Presale: YETIO has come through its presale with a splash, selling 168 million + tokens. Already set at just $0.017, investors have received a 10% bonus for all purchases. The presale will imminently reach Stage 3 — a guaranteed price increase and an influx of investor interest. With Yeti Ouro, users benefit from a deflationary model that rewards long-term holders by limiting the total supply to 1 billion tokens and incorporating a 5% burn clause in its contract, all while still offering staking opportunities and APY rewards. In August 2024, Yeti Ouro was audited by the blockchain security firm SolidProof to enhance its credibility. The report also confirmed the project’s security and operational legitimacy, which also has added to investors’ confidence. Yeti Ouro is methodically staking its claim as a mainstay of both the DeFi and GameFi space, with its successful presale, trusted audit, and unique ecosystem. Join The Yeti Ouro Community Website: https://yetiouro.io/ X (Formally Twitter): https://x.com/yetiouro Telegram: https://t.me/yetiouroofficial Discord: https://discord.gg/YtUsEZ2Zr

title: Gemini Moves into EU Perpetuals Space with an In-Principal Approval
body: Crypto exchange Gemini has received in-principle approval in Malta for an Investment Firm license to offer perpetuals throughout the European Union. The press release shared with Cryptonews noted that this is subject to the Malta Financial Services Authorities (MFSA)’s pre-authorization requirements. However, when granted, the license will allow Gemini to offer regulated futures and options in the countries of the EU and European Economic Area (EEA) to advanced traders and institutions. It will do so under the Markets in Financial Instrument Directive (MiFID II), a framework regulating the traditional financial markets. Getting the in-principal approval in Malta is a key step in the company’s 2025 European expansion strategy, the team said. Gemini aims to increase its offerings for institutional and retail customers. This already includes a spot exchange with more than 90 digital assets, ActiveTrader with over 80 trading pairs, the OTC desk, and eOTC trading system for institutional traders. Mark Jennings, Gemini’s Head of Europe, commented that achieving this in-principal approval is a crucial “milestone in our commitment to providing a best-in-class offering for retail and institutional investors.” Jennings added that the “interest in crypto derivatives, particularly from institutions, has increased significantly in recent years, as crypto matures into a recognised asset class.” You might also like Gemini Settles with CFTC for $5M Over Misleading Bitcoin Futures Statements European Expansion in Full Force Gemini seems to be hard at work expanding its operations throughout the Old Continent. In November 2024, the exchange launched in France as part of its European expansion strategy. Users in that country can open a Gemini account to deposit, trade, and store crypto. Gemini’s CEO of the UK and Europe, Gillian Lynch, commented that the exchange’s research into the French market discovered a growing interest in digital assets. Additionally, the latest in-principal approval comes after Gemini selected Malta as the company’s EU hub and jurisdiction for the Markets in Crypto-Assets (MiCA) application. “Receiving MiCA approval will allow us to continue offering our secure and reliable services to customers throughout the region,” the newest press release said. Also in January 2025, Gemini announced several key senior hires as part of the European expansion. NEW: We’ve chosen Malta as our hub for the Markets in Crypto-Assets (MiCA) framework. This decision underscores our dedication to enhancing regulatory compliance and European growth.… pic.twitter.com/0TAAW88KKU — Gemini (@Gemini) January 21, 2025 Moreover, Gemini is not the only company aiming for licenses to spread their businesses in the EU, moving into Malta first. For example, in June last year, major crypto exchange OKX selected Malta as its hub for MiCA compliance within the European Union. The company chose Malta due to its high regulatory standards and its progressive approach to blockchain and cryptocurrencies. Approved by the European Parliament in April 2023, MiCA is a comprehensive regulatory framework that the EU established to create consistency in crypto regulation among its member states. Malta was quick to embrace MiCA . Also, in early January 2025, Chiliz Group’s fan engagement platform Socios.com secured a Virtual Financial Assets Act (VFAA) license from the Malta Financial Services Authority after meeting key requirements in late 2024. Meanwhile, reports came out in February that Gemini is exploring plans to go public this year. You might also like Excessive Crypto Taxes May Trigger Talent Exodus from EU, Expert Warns The post Gemini Moves into EU Perpetuals Space with an In-Principal Approval appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: PURE WALLET: The World’s First ISO-Certified Offline Blockchain Wallet By Pure Wallet LLC & NS Lab
body: The post PURE WALLET: The World’s First ISO-Certified Offline Blockchain Wallet By Pure Wallet LLC & NS Lab appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News United States – Pure Wallet LLC is pleased to announce the introduction of its new blockchain transaction system, which utilizes patented offline technology to facilitate decentralized digital payments and asset storage. The system is designed to address several challenges associated with traditional blockchain transactions, including dependency on internet connectivity, gas fees, and reliance on hardware-based cold storage solutions. At its core, Pure Wallet’s technology provides an alternative approach by enabling users to conduct transactions without an active internet connection, a feature intended to extend the accessibility of blockchain services to areas with limited connectivity. In addition, the platform eliminates gas fees, significantly reducing transaction costs for frequent users. The solution has been developed to offer a high level of security, supported by ISO 27001 certification, while removing the need for dedicated hardware devices commonly required by conventional cold storage systems. According to the company, Pure Wallet’s system is engineered to simplify blockchain transactions while maintaining robust security measures. This approach may offer an alternative to established cold storage providers in a market that has traditionally depended on hardware solutions from companies such as Ledger and Trezor. With its streamlined design and focus on operational efficiency, Pure Wallet aims to provide a practical method for managing digital assets, particularly in environments where access to the internet is intermittent or unavailable. Revolutionizing Blockchain Payments & Cold Storage Pure Wallet overcomes the major limitations of blockchain payments—gas fees, slow speeds, and reliance on the internet. With its revolutionary security, cost-efficiency, and offline functionality, it is poised to disrupt both the payments and cold storage markets, making blockchain transactions truly practical for everyday use. Designed for ease of use, Pure Wallet offers a straightforward transaction experience, eliminating the delays and costs often encountered in conventional blockchain operations. By removing common barriers, the platform could enable broader adoption of blockchain technology, particularly for microtransactions. The company anticipates that its solution will be of interest to both end-users and investors, contributing to the evolution of digital asset management. For Further Details, Please Visit: https://Purewallet.ai. About Pure Wallet LLC Pure Wallet LLC is a technology firm dedicated to advancing decentralized digital transactions and secure asset storage. Founded by Andrew Cha and Dr. Dong Seong Kim, the founder and CEO of NS Lab, the company has developed a blockchain solution that leverages patented offline transaction technology and ISO 27001-certified security protocols. The platform is designed to provide cost-effective, secure, and user-friendly blockchain transactions without the limitations of traditional hardware-dependent systems. Contact Information Dr. Dong Seong Kim Google Scholar Profile support@purewallet.ai https://Purewallet.ai

title: Test Coin Grows 688% on Binance. Can the Best Wallet Presale Soar to 100x?
body: Less than a week ago, Test ($TST) was listed on Binance and it went on to make astounding gains. Binance founder and ex-CEO Changpeng ‘CZ’ Zhao has distanced himself from Test ($TST) after it was listed on the exchange. The coin was a test coin created based on a BNB Chain tutorial, and has no purpose or utility. But the buzz around it grew, leading $TST’s value to rise by 688% over the past week and reach a $200M market cap. In other news, that landfill reported to hold a $768M Bitcoin hard drive could shut its doors this year . Coincidence or not, this shows just how important crypto custody is, when you could lose entire fortunes from simple mistakes. One crypto presale that can solve that is Best Wallet Token , which builds an ecosystem for one of the best crypto wallets, Best Wallet . With much better utility than a mere Test coin, $BEST is set to take the market by storm as the only crypto wallet to offer direct access to presales. Let’s dig deeper into these news below. Valueless Coin Explodes & Bitcoin Fortune Still Missing Test’s development fanned speculations that CZ has gotten into meme coins and is shifting away from fundamentals. He denied this and reiterated his stance in a statement on X (formerly Twitter) – ‘No. I am a builder. I always focus on fundamentals.’ He also revealed he hasn’t bought a single meme coin so far, though he isn’t against meme coins. ‘I am not into sports cars; I don’t collect art; I haven’t bought any NFTs; I also haven’t bought most altcoins (I hold BTC and BNB). But I am not against any of the above.’ The former Binance executive said he understands why the market prefers meme coins over utility coins. For one, utility coins get more scrutiny from the government, which considers them securities. Utility coins are also harder to speculate on, leading to less volatility that speculators love. Then there’s the element of fun. ‘It’s a cultural thing. There are plenty of die-hard defenders of memes. Don’t go against the community.’ However, the surprising rise of random valueless coins like $TST could spell good news for coins that have purpose or utility. Meme coins like Solaxy and Best Wallet Token that offer real-world utility could easily double or quadruple their price if these projects fulfill their goals. These coins are also in the unique position of being both meme coins and utility coins. This means that speculators will keep on actively trading them as long they generate a lot of buzz. On the other hand, investors seeking stability will also find them attractive since they serve a purpose and are more stable than the average meme coin. Finding the $BEST Way to Keep Your Bitcoins Away From the Landfill A city council in the UK has recently ruled that while it has over 99 problems, a $768M Bitcoin wallet isn’t one of them. This comes after the council of Newport, Wales, announced its plans to close one of its landfills in the 2025-2026 financial year. The Docks Way landfill has been at the center of a legal battle between local resident James Howells and the city council. He reportedly lost his hard drive containing 8K Bitcoins (currently worth around $768M) there after his partner mistakenly threw it in the trash can in 2013. He went to court to get permission to find the drive in the landfill. But the judge eventually dismissed the case. The incident once again highlighted the advantage of keeping cryptocurrencies in non-custodial wallets like Best Wallet . It’s the only one to offer direct access to crypto presales. This provides investors the opportunity to have their say on the Best Wallet ecosystem. Other perks include lower transaction fees, higher staking rewards, and early access to new crypto projects . The roadmap shows ample developments coming up next, including an NFT gallery, Best Card, rewards hub, and market intel analytics to help you identify hidden gems for those juicy profits. Best Wallet is set to capture 40% of the $11B non-custodial wallet market by 2026, and the $BEST presale will be instrumental to that goal. The presale has raised over $9.5M and has a token price of $0.02395. Traders have also staked over 151M tokens with a 175% APY. title: XRP News Today: Ripple’s New Partnerships in Europe & U.S. Set the Stage for XRP Growth
body: The post XRP News Today: Ripple’s New Partnerships in Europe & U.S. Set the Stage for XRP Growth appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News XRP is showing a modest 5% increase, currently trading at $2.50. While this growth isn’t massive, it comes alongside some major announcements from Ripple that could drive further momentum. Ripple’s president, Monica Long, recently shared exciting updates on X, revealing two key expansions that aim to boost Ripple’s global payments network. Very excited to 1/ add another country (Portugal!) to the Ripple Payments network and 2/ grow the vital Brazil-Portugal corridor with Unicambio joining existing customers including Travelex Bank and Mercado Bitcoin! https://t.co/TW0kZQskPF https://t.co/DBW8HNVAMh — Monica Long (@MonicaLongSF) February 11, 2025 Ripple Expands to Portugal The first big news is Ripple’s entry into Portugal. Ripple has partnered with Unicâmbio, Portugal’s leading currency exchange provider, allowing its corporate clients to make fast, cost-effective cross-border payments using Ripple Payments, formerly known as On-Demand Liquidity (ODL). This partnership means businesses in Portugal can now move money across borders more efficiently, thanks to Ripple’s technology powered by XRP. Alongside, Monica Long also announced the strengthening of Ripple’s Brazil-Portugal payment corridor. Making things more exciting for Ripple users, Unicâmbio will now join Ripple’s existing partners in Brazil, including Travelex Bank and Mercado Bitcoin. This corridor is significant because Brazil and Portugal share strong economic and cultural ties, making cross-border transactions between the two countries highly active. However these expansions are more than just new partnerships—they highlight Ripple’s growing influence in Europe and Latin America. By adding Portugal to its network and enhancing connections with Brazil, Ripple is positioning itself as a key player in global finance. This also means XRP’s role in facilitating these payments is expanding, increasing its real-world utility. On the other side, Ripple’s presence in US is also getting better with rumors of Ripple vs SEC getting resolved in March to Ripple’s IPO launch the market is waiting for more such announcements in US as well. XRP need a solid push to gain investor faith back in the asset. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Why XRP ETF Faces Steeper Hurdles Than Solana and Litecoin ETF ? , XRP Reaction Despite these positive developments, XRP’s price hasn’t seen a major surge, showing only a slight increase. XRP is trading around $2.49, holding steady despite market uncertainty. Analyst Ali Martinez highlights $2.27 as a crucial support level; staying above it could spark bullish momentum toward the $3 mark. XRP has been in an uptrend since December 2024, but it’s now testing key support amid mild market reactions to global trade tensions. If it dips below $2.27, XRP risks falling under $2. Meanwhile, Bitcoin’s price movement will likely influence XRP’s next direction, as the broader crypto market often follows BTC’s lead. While the XRP prices are still not impressive, the long-term impact of these partnerships could be significant. if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift(); } // Get user token from cookies const userToken = getCookie('user_token'); if (subscribewithoutData === 'true' && userToken) { // Call the modal function with the category ID subscribed_popupmodal(subscribe_clicked_cat_id); // Remove the flag and category ID from localStorage localStorage.removeItem('subscribe_without_Login'); localStorage.removeItem('subscribe_clicked_id'); } }); /************************** update susbcriber content **************************** */ function initializeSubscriptionButton() { var initialListItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options input[type="checkbox"]'); initialListItems.forEach(function(item) { console.log(item.checked, 'Initial Checkbox checked status'); }); var listItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options li'); if (listItems.length === 0) return; var anyActive = false; listItems.forEach(function(item) { var checkbox = item.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { if (checkbox.checked) { item.classList.add('active'); anyActive = true; // Set anyActive to true } else { item.classList.remove('active'); // Remove 'active' class if checkbox is unchecked } } }); } function updateButtonText(anyActive) { var subscribeButtonSpan = document.querySelector('.subscribe-submit .changeBtnText'); if (subscribeButtonSpan) { if (anyActive) { subscribeButtonSpan.textContent = 'Subscribe Now'; } else { subscribeButtonSpan.textContent = 'Unsubscribe'; } } } function updateSubscriptionButton() { var listItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options li'); if (listItems.length === 0) return; var anyActive = false; listItems.forEach(function(item) { var checkbox = item.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { if (checkbox.checked) { item.classList.add('active'); anyActive = true; // Set anyActive to true } else { item.classList.remove('active'); // Remove 'active' class if checkbox is unchecked } } }); // Update the button text based on whether any list item has the 'active' class updateButtonText(anyActive); } document.addEventListener('click', function(event) { var clickedItem = event.target.closest('.subscription-options li'); if (clickedItem) { var checkbox = clickedItem.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked; updateSubscriptionButton(); } } });

title: Crypto Daybook Americas: ADA Rallies, BTC Looks to Powell's Testimony on Capitol Hill
body: By Omkar Godbole (All times ET unless indicated otherwise) Cardano's ADA is trading higher, buoyed by Grayscale's recent spot ETF application, while bitcoin (BTC) remains rangebound in a lackluster crypto market as we gear up for Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's testimony to Congress. Powell takes the stage on Capitol Hill later Tuesday for his semi-annual update on monetary policy. He'll start with the Senate and repeat his performance in the House of Representatives on Wednesday. The testimony is likely to do little to revive BTC's upswing. The consensus is that Powell will uphold his data-dependent approach, reiterating that the central bank isn't in a rush to cut interest rates anytime soon and is keen on observing more progress with inflation. Data shared by Bloomberg's Lisa Abramowicz shows that market-implied inflation rates for the next two to five years have soared to their highest levels since early 2023. Meanwhile, President Donald Trump's tariffs could underpin inflation. The CME's FedWatch tool currently shows traders anticipate just 50 basis points in cuts by the end of next year, significantly less than the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) outlined in its December forecasts. However, there's a glimmer of hope: If the Consumer Price Index (CPI) release on Wednesday comes in weaker than expected, it could create some upside volatility. In other news, Japanese mobile-game studio Gumi said it is planning to purchase bitcoin worth 1 billion yen ($6.6 million), following Tokyo-listed Metaplanet's lead. Metaplanet began buying BTC last year and its shares soared a staggering 4,800% in 12 months. Social media continues to buzz with debate over the imbalance in Ethereum's ecosystem, where layer-2 scaling products retain most of the generated revenue while contributing only a small percentage back to the foundational layer. Solana, meanwhile, continues to outshine Ethereum and other smart-contract blockchains in decentralized exchange trading volumes and revenue. In traditional markets, gold is taking bull breather while copper, often seen as proxy for global economic health, is trading lower, snapping a six-day winning streak. Stay alert! title: Top 4 Next Altcoins to Explode in 2025 BlockDAG, Injective, Aptos & Ripple!
body: Altcoins often bring the biggest surprises in crypto. While Bitcoin remains the biggest name, some alternative coins have delivered returns far beyond expectations. In 2023, certain lesser-known projects outperformed Bitcoin by over 500%, showing that picking the right altcoin at the right moment can lead to massive gains. With thousands of cryptocurrencies in circulation, filtering real opportunities from the hype requires more than luck. It demands attention to adoption, use cases, and market trends. Below, we break down 4 next altcoins to explode that are shaping today’s crypto market: BlockDAG, Injective, Aptos, and Ripple. Let’s look at their real-world applications, price action, and potential gains. 1. BlockDAG (BDAG): Presale Gem with Unmatched Growth Potential Most blockchains process transactions one at a time, but BlockDAG (BDAG) uses a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) model, allowing many transactions to be processed at once. This setup boosts speed, scalability, and efficiency while avoiding the congestion issues seen in older blockchain networks. BlockDAG’s presale success proves its potential. With $193.7 million raised, 18.3 billion BDAG sold, and 170,000 holders, its expansion is happening fast. But what makes it one of the next altcoins to explode is its approach to rewarding participation. BlockDAG’s 5% USDT referral cashback gives benefits to both buyers and referrers, strengthening its network. Then there’s FINALCALL700—the biggest bonus in crypto—offering a 350% increase on BDAG purchases. At $0.0248 per BDAG in batch 27 and an expected rise to $1 in 2025, those purchasing BDAG now could see a 3,930% return. To put it simply, a $500 BDAG buy today, with the bonus, immediately becomes $2,250. And when BDAG reaches $1? That same amount turns into $90,700 by the end of 2025. 2. Injective (INJ): Improving DeFi with Low Fees Decentralized finance (DeFi) has great potential, but slow transactions and high costs limit its adoption. Injective is solving this by creating a fast and affordable trading environment that keeps DeFi accessible. As a layer-2 decentralized exchange (DEX), Injective allows secure trading without the bottlenecks found in larger blockchains. Its key advantage is cross-chain compatibility, enabling smooth asset transfers between networks. Currently priced at $40.85, INJ has climbed 4.3% in the past 24 hours, reflecting steady growth as more platforms integrate its features. 3. Aptos (APT): Smart Contracts with Real Scalability Smart contracts have changed digital transactions, but they often struggle with slow speeds and high fees. Aptos addresses this by offering a blockchain that processes transactions quickly and cost-effectively. Built using the Move programming language, Aptos is designed to support high transaction volumes without delays. This makes it suitable for DeFi, gaming, and other blockchain applications. Trading at $11.32, APT has dropped 2.1% in the past day, but its rising adoption makes it one of the next altcoins to explode. 4. Ripple (XRP): Transforming Cross-Border Transactions Ripple has been a key player in global payments, providing a faster and cheaper alternative to traditional banking. While international money transfers often take days and involve high fees, Ripple enables near-instant transactions at a much lower cost. As financial institutions increasingly turn to XRP for remittances, its adoption is growing. Currently valued at $0.52, XRP has risen 1.6% in the last 24 hours, showing resilience despite market fluctuations. As regulations around digital currencies improve, Ripple’s role in finance could expand significantly. Final Say— Next Altcoins to Explode! Injective is making DeFi more efficient, Aptos is solving blockchain scaling issues, and Ripple continues to transform payments. But the real question isn’t just which projects are growing—it’s which ones can expand the fastest and bring in the most gains. BlockDAG answers that question with over $193.7 million raised and a potential 3,930% return for those buying in now. A $500 purchase in its presale using the FINALCALL700 offer could turn into $90,700 by 2025, proving that BDAG is one of the next altcoins to explode in 2025. The post Top 4 Next Altcoins to Explode in 2025 BlockDAG, Injective, Aptos & Ripple! appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: Can Pepe Coin Price Hit $0.000017 as 1.8T PEPE Transacts in Loss?
body: Pepe Coin price shows signs of recovery after a bearish week, raising speculation about a potential move to $0.000017. The market has seen renewed optimism, with Bitcoin (BTC) approaching $100,000. Meanwhile, PEPE is holding above a crucial support level despite 1.8 trillion tokens transacting at a loss, fueling discussions about its next price direction. Will PEPE Hit $0.000017 as 1.8T Tokens Move at a Loss? The Pepe Coin price has shown increased volatility as its daily on-chain transaction volume in loss reaches 1.38 trillion PEPE. This figure reflects the total amount of PEPE transacted at a loss within a single day, indicating heightened selling pressure. When large token volumes are moved at a loss, it often signals panic selling or investor capitulation. This trend can contribute to downward price momentum as more holders exit their positions to cut losses. If selling pressure eases and demand strengthens, the meme coin could regain momentum toward the $0.000017 mark. However, sustained losses without renewed buyer interest could prolong the downturn, keeping PEPE at lower price levels. Investors will closely watch market sentiment and exchange supply dynamics to assess whether a reversal is happening. Santiment Pepe Coin Eyes Major Breakout: Key Levels to Watch The price of Pepe coin is at $0.00001044, reflecting a 9.43% increase within the current trading session. The memecoin has entered a crucial phase, with a significant resistance level at $0.0000117 . If PEPE successfully flips this barrier into support , this projects a potential rally of 50% , driving prices toward $0.00001785 . The chart highlights a key price range Pepe has historically consolidated, creating a strong zone of interest for traders. A decisive breakout above $0.0000117 could trigger bullish momentum, potentially setting the stage for further gains. Conversely, if the price fails to sustain current levels and breaks below $0.00000925, downside pressure could intensify. Such a move could result in a 26% drop, dragging Pepe’s value down to $0.00000688. The composite volume profile suggests heavy accumulation within the marked range, further emphasizing the importance of these price levels. A breakout above resistance could fuel a strong uptrend, while a failure to hold support may lead to a steep correction. With the bullish seeming to be gaining trend, the crypto market has seen a slight rebound, with BTC nearing $100k. The global crypto market cap is $3.23T, a 1% surge over the past 24-hours. If the bullish trend in BTC continues, the PEPE price could surge by 50%, fueling other crypto markets. The Pepe Coin price action movement hinges on overcoming key resistance at $0.0000117. A breakout could trigger a rally to $0.000017, while failure to hold support risks a deeper correction. title: Cardano (ADA) and Kaspa (KAS) Surge: In-Depth Price Analysis
body: Both Cardano (ADA) and Kaspa (KAS) have experienced sizable price surges in this current crypto bull market. However, both are also a long way from their respective all-time highs. Can they regain these highs, or will they continue to trend downwards? $ADA breakthrough or rejection? Source: TradingView $ADA is having a great Tuesday. Up 12% on the day so far, it might appear that all is rosy for one of the most passionate and vociferous communities across the whole of the cryptocurrency space. Looking at the price on the weekly chart, it can be seen that $ADA (ADA/USDT) is up against the major horizontal resistance, plus a coinciding 0.5 Fibonacci level. Should the bulls push the price through here, and the price manages to confirm above, the local high at $1.32 is a real possibility. That said, this is very strong resistance, and the price has a good probability of being rejected from here. Also, could it be that this was just a retest and confirmation of this resistance? One element in favour of the $ADA bulls is that the weekly Stochastic RSI is dropping. It should bottom in the next couple of weeks and then there is the possibility of strong upside price momentum returning. $ADA about to get rejected against $BTC? Source: TradingView The $ADA chart against $BTC (ADA/BTC) is however not one of the best. A total 92% correction from the top in 2021 has only so far reduced to 86% today. The weekly chart shows the major horizontal resistance levels. The price is up against one now, and it will be crucial that the bulls flip this level back into support. Down below is the bottom support level. The price must not fall below this. The Stochastic RSI is coming down. However, this is more likely to lend itself to a rejection of the current horizontal resistance before it is able to bottom and potentially send the price up again. The series of lower highs and lows must be broken, and soon. $KAS drops out of 15-month range Source: TradingView $KAS (KAS/USDT) followed a really nice uptrend through 2023 and into the middle of 2024, before making an all-time high of $0.20. In fact, the price sidetracked within a range from November 2023 until earlier this month, when the price dropped out. This is why the current struggle at the $0.10 horizontal level is so important. If the bulls can force the price back into the range, this will have been just a fake-out, and the price can head back to the top of the range. However, if the price is rejected from here, this could be seen as a confirmation of the breakdown, and the price could drop a lot lower quite quickly, given that there is very little support until around $0.05. The weekly Stochastic RSI is heading up, and has passed the 20.00 level, which should spell upside price momentum. Therefore, as long as these indicator lines continue upwards, the bulls should have the advantage. All is not lost. Last chance for $KAS against $BTC Source: TradingView Looking at $KAS against its $BTC pair on the daily chart (KAS/BTC), things do not bode well. A strong downward trend since the end of 2023 has yet to be broken. The Stochastic RSI is rising, but if the overhead resistance is not broken and confirmed above, a rejection from this level could spell disaster. Why hold $ADA or $KAS and not $BTC? In summary, for short-term trades, there is possibly value to be had in backing either of these two cryptocurrencies. However, looking at their long-term performance against $BTC you would have to ask the question: Why hold either and not Bitcoin? Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. title: Hong Kong Confirms Bitcoin, Ether Can be Used to Prove Wealth For Investment Visa
body: A spokesperson for Invest Hong Kong, the territory's government agency that facilitates foreign investments, has confirmed that crypto including ether (ETH) and bitcoin (BTC) can be used as proof of assets when applying for its New Capital Investment Entrant Scheme visa. The visa requires applicants to must prove ownership of net assets worth at least HK$30 million ($3.8 million) over a specified period. There are no specific asset type requirements, the spokesperson said in an email, but a chartered public accountant must sign off on a valuation report. One accountant in Hong Kong has shared success stories on social media of bitcoin and ether being used as a proof of asset for the program. Once the visa is approved, the applicant must invest another HK$30 million in what it calls "permissable assets". A spokesperson for InvestHK confirmed to CoinDesk that cryptocurrency is not considered a permissible asset for this portion of the visa requirements. Hong Kong currently has 9 licensed crypto exchanges , known locally as virtual asset trading platforms. A government spokesperson said in January that the New Capital Investment Entrant Scheme has over 750 applicants.

title: Proton Mail Launches Self-Custodial Bitcoin Wallet
body: Privacy-first email provider Proton has released a Bitcoin wallet focusing on personal security and simplicity. With 100 million Proton Mail account holders worldwide, the Swiss privacy and security company is known for its end-to-end encrypted email, as well as secure VPN and storage services. The encrypted wallet is Bitcoin-only and is intended to make it easy to use BTC as well as store it securely. The wallet’s ‘Bitcoin by email’ service allows Proton Mail users to send BTC securely to another email address, even if it is not a Proton Mail account. title: Wall Street Giant Reveals Main Reason for Ethereum's Decline! Evaluates Trump's Possible Effects on ETH!
body: While the largest altcoin Ethereum (ETH) continues to trend weaker against Bitcoin, the long-term bullish outlook for ETH remains. At this point, while Ethereum experienced one of the biggest declines in the last decline, Citi stated in its latest report that the fundamentals of Etheruem have strengthened despite the price decline, and that the picture for ETH has started to become positive. Wall Street bank Citi reported that despite Ethereum falling more than 20% this year, its fundamentals are strengthening as the total value locked (TVL) of ETH has increased sharply, Coindesk reported. Analysts, who stated that user activity has been fluctuating recently, emphasized that despite this fluctuation, US spot ETH ETFs continue to see inflows and ETH search interest has increased. Citi analysts led by Alex Saunders said: “While user activity has been volatile in recent weeks, the underlying underlying conditions are not that uncertain. Because ETF inflows and searches have increased.” Citi also noted that US President Donald Trump and his family’s DeFi project World Liberty Financial (WLFI) holds more than $200 million in ETH, which could support the US’s pro-ETH and pro-crypto policy. “The ETH holding could be seen as additional motivation to ensure that the US strengthens its support for the crypto space,” the analysts said. Citi analysts recently noted that the decline and weakness in ETH coincided with and was driven by the increase in Bitcoin (BTC) dominance, which has reached multi-year highs currently above 60%. *This is not investment advice. title: Top Crypto Coins to Invest $1000 In 2025: Here Are They!
body: The post Top Crypto Coins to Invest $1000 In 2025: Here Are They! appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News With Bitcoin hitting the $100K milestone, the crypto market is heating up, attracting both retail and big investors looking to make the right moves. With over 10,000 cryptocurrencies available, many investors are left wondering which coins are worth investing in. Therefore, popular crypto YouTuber Aaron Arnold from Altcoin Daily has shared his strategy on how he would invest $1,000 across different types of cryptocurrencies in 2025. Coin 1: $400 Investment Into Bitcoin According to Altcoin daily host Arnold, $400 of the $1,000 should go into Bitcoin (BTC). He sees Bitcoin as digital real estate and a strong hedge against inflation. With BTC trading under $100,000 at the time of his analysis, he considers this a great opportunity to accumulate before its price potentially rises further. He also points out the possibility of the U.S. government establishing a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve (SBR), which could add more demand and value to BTC in the long run. Coin 2: $100 Investment Into Ethereum For Ethereum (ETH), Arnold recommends investing $100 due to its strong position in the stablecoin and DeFi markets. Ethereum continues to dominate the crypto space as a preferred blockchain for smart contracts, making it a solid long-term hold. With most stablecoins running on Ethereum, it remains a key player in the industry, supporting its continued growth and adoption. Coin 3: $200 Solana Network Coins Arnold allocates $200 to Solana (SOL), which he calls the top blockchain of this cycle. He highlights the strong activity on the Solana network, especially with meme coins gaining popularity. However, he also mentions that investors can explore alternatives that fit the “next Solana narrative”, such as Sui (SUI) and Supra (SUPRA), which are newer but show potential. Coin 4: $100 In Artificial Intelligence As AI continues to grow, Arnold suggests investing $100 in AI tokens. His top pick is Bittensor (TAO), but he also mentions Heart.ai (HEART) as a more speculative option with high upside potential. Coin 5: $100 In Real-World Asset Token For real-world asset (RWA) tokenization, Arnold recommends $100 in Ondo (ONDO), a project integrated into BlackRock’s tokenization fund, BUIDL. As an alternative, he suggests Propy (PRO) due to its focus on real estate tokenization. Coin 6: $100 In Gaming Tokens The final $100 goes to gaming tokens, an industry that continues to expand in the crypto space. Arnold picks SuperVerse (SUPER) for community gaming projects but also mentions XBorg (XBG) as a riskier bet focused on digital identity for gamers. This diversified approach aims to balance stability with potentially high returns, making it a strategy worth considering for those looking to invest in 2025.

title: ETH holders in FTX stand to gain $2.5k as repayments start Feb. 18
body: Traders who own Ethereum in their FTX holdings stand to gain back $2,500 as FTX repayments for its Bahamas creditors start this month. The FTX repayment plan, scheduled to start on Feb. 18, will repay creditors’ claims in full, including interests, through BitGo. However, customers will not be able to gain additional profit from current market prices for their FTX holdings, as the repayment plan will refund crypto holdings in accordance with November 2022 prices. This means that traders who held Bitcoin ( BTC ) in the now-fallen crypto exchange will only receive repayment capped at $20,000 per Bitcoin for 98% of its users, as one crypto trader highlighted in a recent post . Today, Bitcoin has bounded to at nearly five times its market price in 2022. At the time of writing, Bitcoin is trading hands at $97,988, rising slightly by 0.28% in the past 24 hours. On the other hand, Ethereum ( ETH ) holders can breathe a sigh of relief as they stand to gain $2,500 from their holdings in FTX. Even though the price of Ethereum today stands at $2,698, a significant gap of nearly $200 from its 2022 price, the loss is not nearly as scalding as it is for Bitcoin holders. Price chart for Ethereum as of February 11, 2025 | Source: crypto.news You might also like: FTX Bahamas repayments to start on Feb. 18 Many traders on X had mixed reactions about the creditor repayments. Most of them were commenting on how the price of Ethereum has remained relatively stable throughout the past two years, while Bitcoin has skyrocketed. “They should have to pay market value at time of payout!!” said one user. “Mixed news: BTC recovery, ETH value remains stable,” said another user. As previously reported by crypto.news, reorganization plans became effective starting from Jan. 3, which required creditor repayments to proceed within 60 days after that. Court filings showed that the defunct crypto exchange has around $13 billion in payout reserves. Although that may be the case, the estate has filed to withhold half of the total amount for disputed claims. Therefore, the exact sum allocated for Bahamas creditor repayments remains unknown. The crypto giant FTX collapsed in 2022 led by founder Sam Bankman-Fried . Investigations into the platform revealed corporate mismanagement and fraud, allegedly orchestrated by Bankman-Fried. He was eventually convicted of multiple charges that led to the firm’s downfall and sentenced to 25 years behind bars. Read more: Sam Bankman-Fried’s parents want Trump to pardon son: report

title: Solana investors shift focus; Experts eye ‘next XRP’
body: Disclosure: This article does not represent investment advice. The content and materials featured on this page are for educational purposes only. With 2025 off to a dynamic start, Solana, Ripple, and a rising newcomer, Remittix, are shaping the future of crypto payments; here’s how they compare. Table of Contents Solana prepares for token-22 update Ripple ledger glitch concerns holders Simplifying global payments, the Remittix way Conclusion As 2025 kicks off with a bang, Solana (SOL) has seen some big price swings despite its blazing-fast transactions and technical prowess. Meanwhile, Ripple (XRP) has been holding its ground in the payments space despite legal battles and network hiccups. Though while these blockchain giants battle it out, a new contender in town has been stealing the spotlight: Remittix (RTX) . Dubbed by experts as the “next XRP, Remittix is rapidly gaining traction as a powerhouse in the global payments sector. With real-world utility, a strong PayFi focus and impressive growth, Remittix is shaping up to be the next big thing for savvy investors. Solana prepares for token-22 update Solana is gearing up for some big changes in 2025 with a focus on scalability and performance enhancements. The development team plans to implement sharding, allowing data to be split across multiple chains, in a bid to reduce congestion and enable parallel transaction processing. Additionally, the introduction of Token-22 aims to offer more functionality for secure payments, royalties and ownership transfers, particularly within the NFT and gaming sectors. Technical improvements aside, Solana continues to face big price changes, having lost 4% of its value in the last week despite a 5.7% net gain over the last month with several ups and downs in between. However, there has been some volatility in the broader crypto space which has likely contributed to Solana’s peaks and troughs. Ripple ledger glitch concerns holders Ripple has hit some bumps lately, with a recent 64-minute ledger outage causing a stir. While no funds were lost, it exposed some network vulnerabilities. Add that to Ripple’s legal conundrum with the SEC which has now been dragging on since 2020 and it’s no wonder investors are feeling jittery. Despite these issues, Ripple is holding its ground, trading around $2.44 with solid market activity and a $141 billion market cap. Ripple has seen a 2% gain in the last 24 hours, suggesting confidence may be coming back. The SEC case and tech glitches create uncertainty, but Ripple’s active community, strong partnerships and real-world utility keep it in the game. Investors are watching closely to see how it all plays out, with hopes of a major rebound. You might also like: Litecoin may see ETFs before Solana; Remittix tipped to disrupt payments market Simplifying global payments, the Remittix way When cryptocurrency first emerged, it promised to revolutionize how we move money. Faster transactions, lower fees and true financial freedom without the need for traditional banks. But fast forward to today and using crypto is still more complicated than it should be. Converting digital assets into cash means navigating exchanges, dealing with hidden fees and waiting days for the funds to clear. Sending money internationally? It often feels just as slow and expensive as using old-school banks. For businesses, the risks of price volatility and the complexity of managing crypto payments have been major roadblocks to adoption. That’s where Remittix comes in, offering a concrete real-world solution. Remittix allows users to instantly convert over 40 different cryptocurrencies into FIAT currencies and send funds directly to any bank account worldwide. No unnecessary delays. No surprise fees. Just a flat, transparent fee structure that ensures what users send is exactly what the recipient receives. This is crypto the way it was meant to be fast, simple and practical. Imagine Leila, a freelance web designer in Turkey earning in Bitcoin from clients across the globe. Instead of jumping through hoops with exchanges and losing money to conversion fees, she uses Remittix to convert her Bitcoin directly into Turkish Lira and has it deposited into her bank account within minutes. Or think of Samir, living in the UK, sending money to his family in India. Traditional remittance services charge high fees and take days to process. But with Remittix, he sends USDT, it’s converted instantly to Indian Rupees and his family receives the money the same day. No delays. No extra costs. No stress. In today’s financial world, privacy feels like it’s fading fast. Banks track every transaction, payment apps analyze user spending habits, and even many crypto exchanges demand intrusive personal information just to process simple transactions. Remittix is different. When you send money through Remittix, the recipient receives it as a standard bank transfer with no indication that the payment started as crypto. Non-invasive questions. No unnecessary data collection. Just users’ money, moving securely, with privacy intact. Many businesses are curious about accepting crypto, but the challenges of price volatility, complex conversions and technical hurdles hold them back. That’s exactly what the Remittix Pay API solves. Remittix makes it simple for businesses to accept crypto payments from customers while automatically converting those payments into FIAT. No more worrying about crypto price swings. No complicated systems to set up. Whether users are running an online store in Indonesia, a consulting agency in the US, or offering freelance services anywhere in the world, Remittix lets them tap into the crypto economy without headaches. Users get paid in their local currency. The customers pay in crypto. It’s that easy. Remittix’s native token, RTX, has been engineered to grow in value over time. With an intentionally capped supply of 1.5 billion tokens, scarcity is built into the ecosystem’s design. Conclusion The Remittix presale is booming, with tokens on offer for $0.0567 in the current stage. The native token has yielded more than $11.4 million in investments, having only been on the market for just a few weeks. With the project situated in a high-value market that continues to grow, analysts are expecting a steep 800% price surge before the presale concludes, with further growth expected post-launch. For anyone looking to get in on a market disruptor in its early stages, Remittix presents an unmissable opportunity. To learn more about Remittix, visit the website and its socials. Users must do their own research before taking any actions related to the company.

title: New XRP Investment? XRP Depositary Receipts (DRs) Launch for Traditional Investors
body: RDC introduces XRP DRs, offering indirect exposure to XRP’s price movements. Anchorage Digital’s role boosts trust and regulatory oversight for XRP DRs. Analysts see potential targets of $4.20, $5, or $6.60 for XRP. Receipts Depositary Corporation (RDC) has just dropped the news about XRP Depositary Receipts (XRP DRs), a new financial tool that lets investors get in on XRP action without directly owning the cryptocurrency. XRP DRs: Like ETFs, But for XRP Ownership Similar to Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) and American Depository Receipts (ADRs), XRP DRs will give investors the chance to profit from XRP’s future gains but without actually holding the asset itself. This move is seen as a bridge between traditional finance and decentralized finance (DeFi), potentially opening up the crypto market to more institutional investors. Related: Crypto’s Going Mainstream Faster Than the Internet Did Anchorage Digital to Custody XRP DRs for Institutions Anchorage Digital, a federally chartered digital asset bank, will serve as the custodian for these XRP DRs. This partnership suggests that the securities may be subject to strict regulatory oversight… The post New XRP Investment? XRP Depositary Receipts (DRs) Launch for Traditional Investors appeared first on Coin Edition .

title: Naoris Protocol Unveils World’s First Post-Quantum DePIN Testnet, Surpasses 500K Users & 2.5M PQ Transactions in First Week
body: Wilmington USA – February 11, 2025, - Naoris Protocol , the pioneer of Decentralized Cybersecurity, has launched the world’s first Post-Quantum DePIN Testnet, achieving over 2.5 million transactions and 500,000 users in its first week. This milestone signals a new era in Web3, where users fortify digital environments while earning rewards, and govtech and enterprises ensure data sovereignty with true post-quantum security.As cyber threats rise and quantum computing evolves, traditional cybersecurity falls short. Naoris Protocol’s Decentralized Proof of Security (dPoSec) blockchain, powered by Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC) and Decentralized SWARM AI, delivers a trustless, sovereign security framework. Aligned with NIST PQC , NATO NCIA , and ETSI standards , dPoSec fortifies Web3 with exponential resilience for Web2, making it fit for critical environments and decentralizing centralized spaces.Explosive Growth Within days of launching, the DePIN Testnet has rapidly scaled: 524,000 Naoris Wallets installed 210,000 Naoris Light Nodes deployed 17 Million+ Cyber-Threats neutralized 2.6 Million+ Post-Quantum ZK Transactions processed As the network stress-tests post-quantum security, dPoSec proves its ability to handle transactions at scale for any Web3 workloads — offering security in orders of magnitude beyond traditional AES/RSA-based cryptography.“Our vision is a cybersecurity framework that strengthens as it expands,” said David Carvalho, CEO & Founder of Naoris Protocol. “The overwhelming response to our DePIN Testnet confirms the demand for decentralized security solutions that eliminate single points of failure and enable collective resilience across Web2 and Web3.” Participants in the Testnet not only protect their digital environment but also actively contribute to the creation of a Decentralized Cybersecurity Mesh network, designed to secure devices, applications, APIs, and critical systems across industries including finance, defense, healthcare, enterprises, and Web3 infrastructure.Transforming Web3 Security Naoris Protocol introduces the Sub-Zero Layer, which any blockchain can integrate to validate both physical infrastructure and on-chain transactions. Two game-changing use cases: Post-Quantum Transaction Resilience: Quantum-safe upgrades for any L1/ L2 blockchain without requiring hard forks. Decentralized Trusted AI Infrastructure: ZK-enabled post-quantum verification ensures AI trustworthiness, removes single points of failure, and maintains data integrity. Real-World Use Cases Driving Adoption Naoris Protocol has developed over 30 institutional and enterprise use case applications across multiple industries on top of its Post-Quantum Cryptography and dPoSec consensus: Intellichat: A sovereign AI-powered system for private/govtech infrastructures. Decentralized Smart Surveillance: AI-driven facial recognition & behavior analysis. Post-Quantum Communications: A secure, private alternative to Slack with built-in data sovereignty. AI-Enhanced Healthcare: Real-time patient monitoring and diagnostics. Post-Quantum Banking Security: A decentralized security layer for financial institutions. IoT-Driven Asset Tracking: AI-enabled predictive maintenance for industrial systems. Smart Logistics & Fleet Management: AI-driven scheduling, route optimization, and real-time tracking. Eliminating Single Points of Failure The July 2024 CrowdStrike outage underscored the vulnerabilities of centralized cybersecurity, crippling enterprises worldwide. Naoris Protocol’s DePIN model eliminates such risks by decentralizing security and trust validation, achieving exponentially greater resilience through post-quantum security by design. “Centralized security is obsolete,” said David Holtzman, Chief Strategy Officer at Naoris Protocol. “By enabling continuous, decentralized security validation, we significantly reduce risk and restore trust in the digital world.” With the DePIN sector expected to reach $3.5 trillion by 2028, Naoris Protocol is positioning itself as the foundational security layer for Web2 and Web3 infrastructure, securing cloud computing, data storage, and IoT networks. How the DePIN Testnet Works Users can install the Naoris Wallet and activate a Browser Security Node (Naoris Light Node), which: Builds a collective "Security Hive Mind," where nodes neutralize threats collaboratively. Transforms devices into security validator nodes for real-time threat detection and mitigation. Blocks ads, trackers, phishing attempts, malware, and insecure connections, and de-anonymization scripts. Rewards users for contributing to the DePIN security network. Naoris Protocol is available for investment, interviews, and technical demonstrations of its groundbreaking Post-Quantum DePIN solution.Join the Post-Quantum DePIN Testnet today https://naorisprotocol.network/testnet For more information: www.naorisprotocol.com Company DetailsOrganization: Naoris ProtocolContact Person Name: Guy DaviesWebsite: www.naorisprotocol.com Email: guy@naoris.com & lucas.b@naoris.com Disclaimer: This is a sponsored press release and is for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.

title: XRP News Today: SEC Shakeup Could Propel XRP To $10 As Ripple Case Takes A Turn
body: The SEC’s legal battle with Ripple is heating up, and a major shakeup could change everything for XRP – a topic we’ll analyze further below. At the same time, Bitcoin still struggles as a practical payment method, but PlutoChain ($PLUTO) might be able to fix that with a hybrid L2 solution. Let’s look at the deets for both projects. XRP Price Prediction: Could a Major SEC Shakeup Push XRP Toward the $10 Mark? XRP is currently trading at around $2.41, down 0.21% in the last 24 hours. During this time, its trading volume has reached approximately $3.33 billion. A nonprofit watchdog, Empower Oversight, has filed a lawsuit demanding the release of an internal SEC report related to potential conflicts of interest. The focus is on former SEC official William Hinman, who had ties to Simpson Thacher, a firm connected to the Ethereum Enterprise Alliance. Critics argue that Hinman’s association may have influenced the SEC’s approach to crypto regulation, which raises concerns about bias in the case against Ripple. If this lawsuit uncovers damaging information, it could put the SEC in a difficult position and potentially force it to reconsider its appeal against Ripple. Hugo , a crypto analyst on X, believes XRP has confirmed a breakout and expects it to surge significantly once the bull run resumes, with a minimum target of $10. PlutoChain ($PLUTO) Is a Hybrid Layer-2 Upgrade That Could Finally Make Bitcoin a Fast, Affordable, and Everyday Payment Solution Bitcoin is one of the most valuable digital assets, but using it for everyday transactions isn’t easy. Many businesses don’t accept it, and since transactions can’t be reversed, handling refunds and disputes is a hassle. These challenges have kept Bitcoin from becoming a practical payment option. PlutoChain ($PLUTO) has a strong potential to change that. As a Layer-2 solution, it could speed up transactions and lower costs. Instead of Bitcoin’s standard 10 minute block time, PlutoChain offers a block time of just two seconds on its Layer-2 network. By working alongside it, this could make Bitcoin much more convenient for everyday purchases. Lower fees are another major plus. By cutting costs, PlutoChain could help Bitcoin function as a real payment system, which might make it easier for businesses and individuals to use BTC without worrying about high transaction fees. But PlutoChain does more than just improve speed and affordability. With Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) compatibility, it could connect Bitcoin to DeFi apps, NFT marketplaces, and AI-powered blockchain projects. This could create new ways to use BTC beyond simply holding it as a store of value. Security is also a top priority. PlutoChain has been audited by SolidProof , QuillAudits , and Assure DeFi . The network undergoes regular code reviews and stress tests to make sure its system is safe and reliable. During its testnet phase, PlutoChain successfully processed over 43,200 transactions in a single day, which demonstrates it can scale efficiently. Unlike Bitcoin, where miners and developers control upgrades, PlutoChain puts decision-making in the hands of users. It allows the community to propose and vote on network changes and could make Bitcoin more decentralized, transparent, and adaptable. The Takeaway With the SEC facing legal pressure, XRP’s case could take a major turn and even lead to greater adoption. Meanwhile, PlutoChain ($PLUTO) might be an interesting project to watch in the coming weeks. Its Layer-2 solution could finally make Bitcoin practical for everyday use by offering faster transactions, lower fees, and DeFi integration. ——– Remember, this article is not financial or trading advice. All cryptocurrencies are volatile, and past performance is not a guarantee of future results. Always conduct your own research and/or consult with experts before making any crypto-related decisions. Trade responsibly. Forward-looking statements are uncertain and might not be updated. Disclosure: This is a sponsored press release. Please do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any projects. Read the full disclosure here .

title: Analysts Anticipate 50x Gains for This Altcoin as Ethereum Stays Firm at $2,500
body: Ethereum (ETH) continues to trade steadily around the $2,500 mark, drawing the attention of investors who see it as a long-term market leader. Nevertheless, many are also exploring newer altcoins that may offer higher growth potential. One standout project is Mutuum Finance (MUTM)—a decentralized platform for lending and borrowing that’s carving out a niche in the DeFi arena. With a presale price of just $0.01 and forecasts indicating a potential 50x rally after launch, some analysts believe Mutuum Finance could emerge as a top-performing altcoin by 2025. As ETH holds the line at $2,500, eyes are shifting to MUTM as a prime opportunity for robust returns. Ethereum (ETH) Maintains Momentum Ethereum (ETH) remains anchored around $2,500, showing resilience amid market fluctuations. Buyers have consistently intervened to prevent larger drops, leading analysts to compare ETH’s current price patterns to past market troughs—a sign that a recovery might be on the horizon. Institutional demand has largely held steady, as inflows into Ethereum-based investment tools continue despite recent market unease. Still, short-term volatility concerns persist. Some speculate ETH could briefly slip below $2,500 before rebounding. Activity in the options market points to a mix of caution and bullish anticipation over the coming months. While Ethereum’s fundamental outlook remains upbeat, its near-term price movements will likely mirror broader market sentiment and overall risk appetite among investors. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) Emerges as a DeFi Contender Standing out in the search for undervalued yet high-potential altcoins, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) introduces a decentralized lending and borrowing platform designed for real-world utility. Through both Peer-to-Contract (P2C) and Peer-to-Peer (P2P) markets, users can earn by supplying assets or borrow against their crypto collateral, offering a wide range of flexibility and efficiency. Now in its first presale phase, MUTM is priced at $0.01—its most accessible tier before incremental price hikes lead to a $0.06 launch value. Over 7 million tokens have already sold, reflecting surging demand from investors eager to secure tokens ahead of later stages. Analysts are forecasting a possible 50x jump in MUTM’s price, meaning an early $500 stake could theoretically evolve into $25,000 once the token goes live. DeFi Innovations and Tokenomics Mutuum Finance is underpinned by a strong tokenomics structure designed to drive sustained growth. Of the total token supply, 1.82 billion are reserved for the presale, granting early backers an opportunity to come in before demand lifts the price. A built-in buy-and-distribute approach further underpins price stability; fees gathered from the lending and borrowing platform are allocated to buy MUTM in the open market, with those tokens subsequently sent to mtToken stakers. This mechanism steadily reduces supply, creating continual buy pressure and bolstering the token’s market value. Users can deposit crypto assets to liquidity pools and receive mtTokens that earn interest over time, while borrowers put up collateral rather than liquidating their holdings. For example, a holder with 6 BNB could borrow up to $2,500 worth of other digital assets at a 75% loan-to-value (LTV) ratio, thereby preserving exposure to BNB’s price potential while accessing funds. Mutuum Finance also plans to launch an overcollateralized stablecoin on the Ethereum network, aiming to raise both liquidity and confidence in the project’s DeFi ecosystem. Ultimately, Mutuum Finance’s roadmap and utility-focused design could pave the way for listings on reputable exchanges after the official launch. Greater visibility on leading trading platforms, paired with the ongoing buy-and-distribute mechanism, would likely fuel additional demand and sustain upward momentum for MUTM’s price. With its presale underway at $0.01, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) has already caught the attention of investors seeking substantial upside. Analysts project a 50x rally, supported by a reliable DeFi platform, transparent tokenomics, and a structured approach to scaling. While Ethereum (ETH) maintains a strong foothold near $2,500, those searching for more dramatic gains are increasingly turning to MUTM. For individuals looking to invest in innovative projects with the potential for exponential growth, Mutuum Finance is fast becoming a focal point in the altcoin market. For more information about Mutuum Finance (MUTM) visit the links below: Website - Linktree Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

title: Shift from Memecoins to Layer-1 Altcoins Signals Market Maturity: Details
body: The crypto market appears to be pivoting toward a more stable and sustainable cycle as interest wanes in speculative memecoins, according to data from onchain analytics platform Santiment. In a recent report, Santiment revealed that discussions surrounding top layer-1 blockchains, including Ethereum, Solana, Toncoin, and Cardano, now account for 44.2% of social media conversations about specific cryptocurrencies. In contrast, the six leading memecoins combined garner a mere 4% of the chatter. Layer-1 Altcoins Dominate Memecoins The shift suggests a renewed focus on foundational blockchain technologies, which are critical for long-term growth and real-world adoption. “Increased attention on these assets usually indicates a more mature and informed approach by the community,” Santiment noted, highlighting that these networks support smart contracts, decentralized applications, and scalable solutions essential to the crypto ecosystem. Memecoins like Dogecoin, Shiba Inu, and Pepe have experienced a sharp decline in social media buzz. The report speculated that recent market volatility may have dampened enthusiasm for these assets, which historically represent phases where traders chase quick profits before inevitable corrections. Long-Term Confidence Meanwhile, Santiment reported that 224,410 Ether, valued at approximately $600 million, was withdrawn from major exchanges between February 8 and February 9. This marked the largest single-day outflow in nearly two years. Such withdrawals typically indicate a shift toward long-term holding, as investors remove assets from exchanges to safeguard them in private wallets. Santiment characterized this development as a “strong sign” for Ethereum’s price resilience, despite recent struggles. “It signals long-term confidence by investors,” the platform emphasized. Meanwhile, on February 10, an inactive wallet holding 14,000 Bitcoin, untouched for seven to 10 years, suddenly became active, moving funds without transferring them to any exchanges. Crypto Dan, a contributor to analytics platform CryptoQuant, noted that while such movements may trigger concern, they do not necessarily signal impending sell-offs. “In the past, similar events didn’t always result in price declines,” he said. Memecoin activity surged following the launch of US President Donald Trump’s memecoin , with Pump.fun reaching a record $3.3 billion in weekly trading volume. The post Shift from Memecoins to Layer-1 Altcoins Signals Market Maturity: Details appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: Pepe Coin Price Prediction: Can PEPE Outperform Dogecoin and Shiba Inu While PlutoChain Gains Momentum?
body: Pepe Coin (PEPE) continues to gain traction with its recent listing on major Japanese exchanges. This exposure may help PEPE build momentum and challenge established meme coins like Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB). Meanwhile, PlutoChain ($PLUTO) is developing an innovative Layer-2 solution that could unlock new possibilities for Bitcoin. By introducing smart contracts and enhancing transaction speeds, PlutoChain might expand Bitcoin’s utility beyond just being a store of value. Let’s check out the details. Pepe Coin Price Prediction: Could PEPE Outperform DOGE and SHIB as It’s Getting Listed on Big Japanese Crypto Exchange Pepe Coin (PEPE) has taken a big step forward with its recent listing on Bitflyer, one of Japan’s leading crypto exchanges. This move places PEPE in front of a broader audience of Japanese traders, which could boost its visibility and adoption. The exchange confirmed the listing in an announcement on X , highlighting PEPE’s status as the fourth-largest meme coin by market cap. This listing follows Binance Japan’s decision to add PEPE to its platform, which shows the token’s rising popularity in the region. More exchange listings often lead to increased trading volume and investor interest, which could push PEPE’s price higher. Given the growing demand in Japan and expanding global exposure, PEPE might be in a position to outperform its rivals. Analyst @CryptoELlTES , predicts that the momentum of PEPE is building and that it could go up as much as 8x. Can PlutoChain’s Hybrid Layer-2 Technology Bring a New Era for Bitcoin in 2025? PlutoChain ($PLUTO) is working on a Layer-2 solution that could enhance Bitcoin’s capabilities, potentially addressing areas where it lags behind networks like Ethereum and Solana. With the introduction of features such as smart contracts and decentralized applications (dApps), PlutoChain may help Bitcoin evolve beyond its role as a store of value. Designed for speed, PlutoChain could process transactions in just two seconds, significantly faster than Bitcoin’s 10-minute block time. Another advantage is its Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) compatibility , which could enable PlutoChain to integrate seamlessly with Ethereum’s ecosystem. This might open up opportunities in decentralized finance (DeFi), NFTs, and AI-driven applications. Early testnet results indicate it could handle over 43,200 transactions per day, a strong indicator of potential scalability. One aspect that sets PlutoChain apart is its governance model. Rather than relying on a single authority, decision-making is decentralized, potentially allowing the community to play a role in shaping the network’s future. Security remains a priority, with PlutoChain undergoing audits from SolidProof , QuillAudits , and Assure DeFi to ensure reliability. If PlutoChain successfully implements its platform, it could help Bitcoin expand beyond simple transactions and become a powerful platform for decentralized applications. Bottom Line Pepe Coin’s listing on major Japanese exchanges shows increasing demand for the meme project, potentially positioning it for gains against Dogecoin and Shiba Inu. title: While Many Countries Consider Investing in Bitcoin, This European Country Has Closed the Doors to BTC!
body: While US President Donald Trump has begun his moves on the national Bitcoin reserve, albeit slower than expected, he has also mobilized other countries. While other countries besides the USA started to investigate the BTC reserve, one country made the opposite statement. Accordingly, the President of the National Bank of Poland (NBP), Adam Glapiński, announced that the bank does not intend to keep Bitcoin reserves under any circumstances and will not purchase Bitcoin under any circumstances. Glapiński said at a conference that for an asset to be considered for the NBP to add it to its reserves, it must be “absolutely safe”. When asked whether the NBP was considering holding reserves in Bitcoin, Glapiński replied: “The head of the Czech National Bank told me that he had an idea about Bitcoin, that is, an original idea. At first, I said no. Because the Polish Central Bank is definitely not considering Bitcoin reserves. Because we believe that reserves should be absolutely safe. There are many good things to say about Bitcoin, but not all of them are good things that provide a permanent, secure reserve. I don't need to tell you how much Bitcoin has increased, how much it is worth, but this is not a certainty. Everyone takes the risk of buying it. You can buy Bitcoin and make a lot of money, or lose a lot. But we prefer something more certain and secure. “We accumulate gold, dollars and euros, and also marginally other elements. In our opinion, these are very safe.” *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: While Many Countries Consider Investing in Bitcoin, This European Country Has Closed the Doors to BTC!

title: Racing To The Top 1Fuel Sets Off On Journey To Toncoin & Tron But Could This Be The Best Horse In The Pack?
body: Some crypto investors believe a project should prioritize a particular offering to succeed, while others believe a project should be versatile. Toncoin and Tron are two prominent crypto projects that can do a lot, but both have a specific use case they are more known for. Let’s compare them to the more specialized 1FUEL and learn why this exchange could surpass their price gains. Toncoin (TON): An enduring transaction privacy defender Toncoin is a multipurpose blockchain that is primarily known for its privacy features. These include confidential transactions, ring signatures, stealth addresses and CoinJoin. However, governments worldwide soon made it clear that they don’t like privacy-oriented coins. Accordingly, the Toncoin team tried to be known for more than privacy. Toncoin has since delivered a decentralized file storage system and integrated with Telegram, Donate, and other platforms as a payment medium. Toncoin has also ventured into the memecoin world with a project tied to Notcoin. The Toncoin team has also advanced in sharding, which makes every dApp atop this blockchain much faster. TRON (TRX): A party starter in the blockchain world TRON is another multi-use blockchain that has slowly become more known for a specific use case – entertainment. TRON has been working on ways for content creators to monetize their work without losing money to intermediaries. However, the TRON ecosystem has tried to maintain a foothold in other use cases with innovations like WinkLink, an oracle for safely feeding dApps with real-world data. TRON also offers exchange services via SunSwap, lending services through JustStable and JustLend DAO and a wallet to harmonize everything. These two projects show that it’s not about “single use case” being better than “multiple use cases” or vice versa. Instead, it’s about being clear about which path you’re taking. If you focus on a specific use case, users might expect that same quality of user experience elsewhere, yet you aren’t able to deliver. This could lead to a scenario where your less prioritized use cases stagnate and resources spent on those dApps end up wasted or with a very poor return on investment. 1FUEL (OFT): An emerging DEX reimagination 1FUEL has made it clear from the start that the focus will be on exchange services, with all other offerings geared towards enhancing that experience. This project will offer a wallet just like the projects above have done to converge token holdings and streamline dApp access. 1FUEL will also offer AI-powered features so traders can leave strategizing and emergency responses to intelligent bots while earning more profits. Remember, they’ll be able to trade across chains, which broadens the data pool, enabling the AI to learn more about various markets and apply it in optimizing portfolio allocations. 1FUEL will back this up with built-in mixing capabilities, enabling users to conceal their transaction paths. This will be complemented by military-grade cold storage to keep inactive coins in secure offline locations. Lastly, 1FUEL will offer a crypto debit card for spending your crypto wherever ordinary bank cards work.
